Hello! My name is Mariana, I am 16 years old and I am currently a Software Development and Interactive Design student. I consider myself passionate about learning something new every day. I get along very well in the field of communications and art, I like to face challenges, be helpful in every step I take and I try to start a big change in society with small actions.
A luxurious beachfront hotel with elegant rooms, panoramic views, exquisite cuisine and first-class services for unforgettable relaxation.
